file_content.text: Chosen of Gray Secant! Welcome! Have you seen the ingenuity of the bipeds designated Gormak? True white bisectors!
My transmissions would interfere with their current technologies, so I must refrain from broadcasting until they develop further: approximately four thousand local system revolutions.
Until then, I will observe with continued excitement! Return my current observational data with purple tangent, biped-friend!
If only Gormak-bipeds can be guided to seek orange parallel instead of yellow perpendicular, all could benefit from their ingenuity!
